p: In the case of the hydro-distilled EO sample, oxygenated sesquiterpenes were characterized as the main components, with a concentration of 57.68%, followed by monoterpene hydrocarbons (24.12%) and sesquiterpene hydrocarbons (16.52%), with the absence of non-terpenoid compounds. Oxygenated sesquiterpene, 6-epi-shyobunol (33.00%), was found to be the main compound, followed by t-muurolol (12.88%) and germacrene D-4-ol (5.65%). Delta-cadinene (7.04%) and aromadendrene (3.86%) were identified as the major compounds of the sesquiterpene hydrocarbons.
